    • Method Detail

      • getIFD

        public IFD getIFD()
        Copy the internal IFD

        one of the use case is inserting pages into existing TIFFs. See for example TIFFTweaker.insertPage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, com.icafe4j.io.RandomAccessOutputStream, java.util.List<com.icafe4j.image.tiff.IFD>, int, com.icafe4j.image.writer.TIFFWriter)

        Returns:
        a read-only version of the internal IFD

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.Integer stripLen)
        A call back method used by encoders to update the strip length for multiple strip TIFF images.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable<java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        stripLen - compressed strip length for the current strip
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                     int imageWidth,
                     int imageHeight,
                     java.io.OutputStream os)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Write a self-contained single page TIFF image
        Specified by:

        imageHeight - image height

      • writePage

        public int writePage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage frame,
                     int pageNumber,
                     int maxNumber,
                     RandomAccessOutputStream randomOutStream,
                     int offset)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Write a single page to TIFF stream.

        Instead of writing a self-contained TIFF image as write(int[], int, int, java.io.OutputStream) does, this method writes a bare-bone single page as part of a multiple page TIFF.

        Parameters:
        frame - input BufferedImage
        randomOutStream - RandomAccessOutputStream
        offset - stream offset to write this page
        Returns:
        stream offset after writing this page
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
